menu

Audi, Volkswagon, Subaru...why yes I did build all of their cars. And by "build", I mean help implement the designs for each of their new car parts retail sites. And by "implement", I mean write a significant portion of the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

So if you haven't figured it out yet, I'm a girl, which means I'm genetically addicted to shoes. Luckily, I got to design, implement, and maintain Julie Bee's site, a luxury shoe brand. This included designing the majority of their promotional material and implementing custom functionality on top of the BigCommerce platform. And to top it off, Julie is a real person. Who woulda thunk?

Nerd + Nerd = Monokai Code Company. I co-founded Monokai alongside my husband as an ode to our love...of technology. We aimed to be an web development firm that brought a sense of elegance and simplicity to the table. As lead designer, I tried to capture that inspiration in our company's website.
